Package nl.harm27.obswebsocket.api.events

Class BaseEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.harm27.obswebsocket.api.events.BaseEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BroadcastCustomMessage, Exiting, Heartbeat, SceneCollectionChanged, SceneCollectionListChanged, ScenesChanged, SwitchScenes
    public abstract class BaseEvent
extends Object
    Events are broadcast by the server to each connected client when a recognized action occurs within OBS.
    See Also:
    OBS WebSocket Documentation
